alert.note: Alert for Carteret; Craven; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:41AM EDT until July 14 at 4:15AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAVEN...CARTERET AND SOUTHEASTERN PAMLICO COUNTIES... At 341 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harlowe, or near Newport, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, South River, North River, Merrimon, Harlowe, Florence, Otway, Janeiro, Great Neck, Wildwood, Whortonsville, Open Grounds Farm, Maribel, Nc Pamlico, North Harlowe, Bettie, Merritt and Cherry Branch Ferry Terminal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
